channel.title: Da 0wnz banned
channel.description:
im sorry if this isnt in the right topic, but please read this moderators
Hi me and da 0wnz have been buds for like 2 years now and i called him today and asked him if he was working on any servers or anyting and he said no because moparscape banned him from the forums so hes giving up. he told me why and he said he was at friends houses telling them to sign up and post a reply so it would bump but he really didnt sign up on different accounts he w as only trying to hel the moparscape community by getting more members...
this is what he said happens
Sorry Da 0wnz, you are banned from using this forum! Multiple accounts are against the rules. You have been permanently banned.
